uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.jdbc.filter

Class FilterSelect<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.jdbc.filter.FilterSelect<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of object being filtered.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackJoinFilter, FilterAdd, FilterDelete, FilterReader, FilterUpdate, FilterWipe, OrphanFilter

    public class FilterSelect<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class that holds the rules for turning filters into SQL selections.
